title: Elegant Kempu Stone Bangles - Kadiyamulu Design
materials: High Clarity Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Stones. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: These bangles showcase a unique fusion design with alternating square and circular gold frames, each delicately set with sparkling cubic zirconia stones. The geometric pattern adds a modern twist to the traditional kadiyam style. The secure clasp ensures easy wear and removal.
colors: Lustrous Gold with shimmering white Cubic Zirconia stones.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional occasions like weddings (pellillu)
and contemporary celebrations. Adds a touch of elegance to any outfit
description: These bangles offer the perfect blend of tradition and modernity. The use of high-quality Cubic Zirconia provides a diamond-like brilliance at an accessible price point. Expertly handcrafted in Hyderabad, these bangles are a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and durability. A timeless design that can be passed down through generations.
